scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && npm run db:seed
scripts.start: npm run db:start && npm run dev
scripts.start:all: npm run db:start && concurrently -n "API,UI" -c "blue,magenta" "npm run dev" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/dist apps/*/dist
